title: Can't login after patching for Azir
body:
After my client patching to add Azir, I haven't been able to connect to the League of Legends servers. I've tried multiple accounts, and after only about 2 seconds of attempts to log in, it gives me this error message: http://gyazo.com/96ce06b4797b3f93e45b068dd5021f9b . I was on and playing just fine last night, but immediately after the 4.16 patch update to include Azir, it fails to let me log in. The rest of my internet is working except for logging into League servers.
EDIT: READ IN COMMENTS FOR FIX (WORKED FOR ME)

replies.body: It could be that Riot had temporarily closed servers because of the fact they were dealing with fixing Azir after seeing massive amounts of bugs.
Ok guys, if you are still struggling with this try right clicking league and "run as administrator"
i got a probleme too since last patch! when i attempt to open lol it says PVP.net patcher kernel stop working.... i cant open my league now. how can i resolve this probleme?

I seem to have found a fix for this issue. I went into C: Drive > Riot Games > League of Legends > Logs > Game - R3d Logs > and then deleted all of the logs that were in there (Mine had a little over 2,000). If this fixes it for anyone else reading this thread, tell me and I will make another post regarding it.
This did not work for me, sadly
Same problem. Seemed to effect live and PBE. Also none of the news sections of the launch screen will load.
I am having the same issue :/ I know it's not my internet because everything else works just fine.
Even after repairing my entire client, it still isn't working. Others have been saying it just fixes itself eventually, so I guess im going to have to just wait?
yes i am currently having same issue. please help.
I have been having this issue too. If anyone knows how to fix this problem, it would be greatly appreciated.
